attributes.action: Abolish bus lanes in areas where they are not need.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is nothing worse than sitting in a single line of traffic when there is an empty bus lane for miles and no buses to be seen for miles. I would suggest getting rid of buses because I believe they cause more pollution, congestion and not enough people use them.  Bring back trams.
